header.title: THE MAGIC OF NEW ISHTAR POWER
header.category: Occult Sciences, Western Esotericism, Practical Magic

central_thesis: The book presents a practical, universalist magical system centered on 'Ishtar Power' and its eight associated 'Energy Transformer Personalities,' accessible through a distinctive eight-pointed star symbol. The core thesis is that by aligning one's personal energy with these universal forces, individuals can manifest desired changes in all aspects of life—from financial success and health to love, spiritual growth, and psychic abilities—by consciously directing psychic energy ('causing change in accordance with your will').

structure_content.chapter_title: ISHTAR: YOUR PERSONAL POWER TO ACHIEVE ANYTHING
structure_content.summary: Introduces 'Ishtar Power' as a universal, personal energy source and its eight associated 'Energy Transformer Personalities' mapped onto an 8-pointed star, serving as a foundational sigil for manifestation and self-improvement.

structure_content.chapter_title: LET ISHTAR POWER SWEEP AWAY OBSTACLES TO YOUR SUCCESS
structure_content.summary: Explains how the 8 'Energy Transformer Personalities' correlate with the seven chakras and planetary influences, providing methods (chants, gemstone work) to clear energy blocks and align personal power for success.

structure_content.chapter_title: FOCUS ISHTAR POWER TO BRING A BIG BOOST TO YOUR FINANCES
structure_content.summary: Details rituals, chants, and symbolic work, including the 'Money Pentagram Ritual' using the Ishtar Star and a dollar bill, to attract wealth and prosperity by engaging specific 'transformer personalities.'

structure_content.chapter_title: COMMAND ISHTAR POWER TO GET A FAST LIFT FOR YOUR VITALITY, HEALTH AND ZEST FOR LIFE
structure_content.summary: Presents the 'Ishtar Renewal Rite' as a comprehensive technique for physical healing and vitality, incorporating chakra breathing, chants, and sympathetic magic for self and others.

structure_content.chapter_title: HOW TO APPLY ISHTAR ENERGY TO BRING A BIG BOOST TO YOUR LOVE LIFE
structure_content.summary: Focuses on enhancing attractiveness and relationships through chakra exercises (especially the Root Center Breathing Exercise) and specific chants to align one's aura for attracting love and social respect.

structure_content.chapter_title: ISHTAR ENERGY FOR CLEARING AWAY SECRET PSYCHIC ATTACK AND/OR OBSESSING ENTITIES
structure_content.summary: Describes methods for psychic protection and banishing negative influences, including the construction and use of a 'Psychic Stick' and a powerful 'Ishtar Psychic Blockbuster' ritual using physical components like onion and chili.

structure_content.chapter_title: HARNESS YOUR ISHTAR ENERGY TO OVERCOME FEELINGS OF FUTILITY OR USELESSNESS AND ADD RICH NEW MEANING TO YOUR LIFE
structure_content.summary: Introduces the concept of a 'Spirit Lover' for guidance and creative inspiration, and the 'Ishtar/Marduk Laser Power' technique to 'burn away' limiting conditions and foster personal purpose.

structure_content.chapter_title: USING ISHTAR ENERGY TO BECOME A TRULY "SUPER" BEING
structure_content.summary: Guides the practitioner to unlock higher potential through body-mind-emotion-spirit alignment, emphasizing dream work, mental projection, and lucid dreaming as pathways to 'out-of-body experiences.'

structure_content.chapter_title: GENERATE FINANCIAL WINDFALLS AND WIN AT GAMBLING AND CONTESTS—WITH ISHTAR ENERGY
structure_content.summary: Explores psychological techniques like the 'Monopoly Money' method to overcome 'worthiness blocks' and details the 'Ishtar Permanent Thoughtform' ritual for consistent financial windfalls and success in games of chance.

structure_content.chapter_title: HOW TO DRAW ON ISHTAR POWER FOR SPECIAL HELP IN BUSINESS OR TO GET A NEW JOB OR PROMOTION
structure_content.summary: Adapts the 'Ishtar Fertility Rite' and associated chants for career advancement, business growth, job attainment, and promotions, emphasizing persistent application of Ishtar energy.

structure_content.chapter_title: ISHTAR MAGIC FOR SPECIAL HELP IN STUBBORN HEALTH PROBLEMS
structure_content.summary: Provides specialized techniques for persistent health issues, including the 'Ishtar Unifying Rite' for overall healing, targeted gemstone applications with foil-lined cones, and methods for creating healing amulets and for body shaping.

structure_content.chapter_title: LET ISHTAR POWER OVERCOME THE TOUGHEST CASES OF LONELINESS, LACK OF LOVE, OR LACK OF RESPECT AND PRESTIGE
structure_content.summary: Offers practical rituals such as the 'Ishtar Friendship-Attracting Program' and the 'Ishtar Mating Call Rite' using specific ingredients and chants to improve social connections, romantic relationships, and self-esteem.

structure_content.chapter_title: HOW TO USE ISHTAR POWER TO BRING YOURSELF GOOD LUCK AND THE "CHARMED LIFE"
structure_content.summary: Teaches how to cultivate 'psychic magnetism' for good luck and a 'charmed life' by consistently recharging one's aura with Ishtar energy, timing rituals using planetary hours, and embracing a philosophy of sharing success.

structure_content.chapter_title: SUMMON ISHTAR POWER TO SEE INTO AND CONTROL YOUR FUTURE
structure_content.summary: Explores precognition and influencing future events, introducing the 'Ishtar Future Viewing Rite' for clairvoyance and the 'Ishtar Vector Rite' to actively change undesirable outcomes, often applied to personal or financial situations.

structure_content.chapter_title: LET ISHTAR AND THOTH HELP YOU ACHIEVE CONTROLLED OUT-OF-THE-BODY EXPERIENCES
structure_content.summary: Provides specific exercises for astral projection and achieving conscious out-of-body experiences, involving mental projection techniques, dream programming, and the combined energies of Ishtar, Thoth, and Bast.

structure_content.chapter_title: TROUBLESHOOTING WITH ISHTAR—THE POWER OF POSITIVE STUPIDITY
structure_content.summary: Addresses common challenges in magical practice by advocating a mindset of 'Positive Stupidity' (consciously ignoring doubt), emphasizing mood management, and integrating the Babylonian Planetary Hours system for optimal timing of rituals.

structure_content.chapter_title: NOW LET ISHTAR OPEN THE DOOR TO YOUR HIGHER POWERS
structure_content.summary: Guides the practitioner towards spiritual growth and transcending personal limitations by successfully passing 'tests' of fear, love, and power, fostering a deep relationship with the universe, independent of specific religious dogma.

structure_content.chapter_title: ISHTAR PYRAMONIX: DISCOVER AND WORK THE GLITTERING GOLD MINE OF THE PAST
structure_content.summary: Utilizes mental projection (based on astral projection techniques) to view past historical events or 'past lives' not for reincarnation belief, but for extracting useful knowledge and creative inspiration.

structure_content.chapter_title: EXOTIC APPLICATIONS OF ISHTAR POWER
structure_content.summary: Introduces advanced 'gadgetry' such as the 'Ishtar Multi-Star Sheet' (a larger sigil) and electronic-magical devices (foil-lined cones, wires, plates) to amplify Ishtar Power for various applications, connecting to Manning's other Atlantean Generator concepts.

structure_content.chapter_title: HOW TO MAKE ISHTAR A PARTNER IN YOUR PERMANENTLY VICTORIOUS LIFE
structure_content.summary: Concludes by integrating all techniques into a holistic lifestyle focused on 'MOOD, ATTITUDE, CONTACT, ACTION, EFFECTIVENESS and GROWTH,' promoting a 'love affair with life' and becoming an 'Ambassador of the Living Light.'

key_concepts.definition: Universal psychic energy, synonymous with personal power, accessed through the Ishtar system. It is defined as 'causing change in accordance with your will.'

Eight specific energetic entities (Nergal, Ra, Ishtar, Osiris, Marduk, Thoth, Bast, Isis) associated with directions, planets, colors, and human endeavors, channeled via the Ishtar Star. These are viewed as universal forces rather than traditional deities in a religious sense.

The central sigil/medallion of the system, acting as a gateway and organizer for the 'Energy Transformer Personalities' and their associated forces. It serves as a visual and energetic anchor for rituals.
A portable, charged version of the Ishtar Star, often worn or carried, used for continuous energy connection and on-the-go manifestation by simply touching it and stating an intention.

A specific ritual sequence of touching various points of the eight-pointed Ishtar Star, often with visualization, for focused energy direction towards a particular goal (e.g., money, health). Despite the name, it's an application of the 8-pointed star's points, not a separate 5-pointed symbol.

Integrated with the Ishtar Star points as psychic centers for energy flow and manipulation. Each 'Energy Transformer Personality' is correlated with a specific chakra, facilitating focused energy work.

A physical, homemade electronic device (constructed from an ignition coil, batteries, and wire) used for psychic protection, identifying negative psychic influences, and banishing unwanted energies or entities.
A potent physical ritual involving symbolic items (charcoal, onion, dates, chili bone) and specific chants performed at the altar to break severe psychic attacks or deeply ingrained obsessions.

An unseen guide or aspect of the subconscious mind accessed through the Ishtar system for inspiration, guidance, and emotional support, conceptualized as a personal connection to the universal energies.

A focused mental projection technique combining Ishtar (Solar Plexus) and Marduk (Throat Chakra) energies, visualized as a powerful 'laser ray,' to 'burn away' unwanted conditions, obstacles, or negative thoughtforms.
The ability to attract desired outcomes (e.g., good luck, financial windfalls, positive relationships) by cultivating and projecting a positive energetic aura and maintaining a winning mindset.

A mental projection and visualization technique, engaging Ishtar and Thoth energies, for precognition or clairvoyance, allowing the practitioner to 'see' future events as if on a 'little TV screen inside your head.'

A ritual utilizing Ishtar, Marduk, and Nergal energies, combining visualization and chanting, to actively influence and change undesirable future events by 'slashing' negative mental pictures and 'building' desired outcomes.

A mental discipline of consciously ignoring doubt, skepticism, and negative thoughts or external reasons why something 'can't work' to maintain magical effectiveness and achieve success. It is about 'the ability to ignore all the reasons something can't work and simply get on with it, trusting in the underlying mechanics of the universe.'

practical_system.description: The 'New Ishtar Power' system is a syncretic, results-oriented magical framework utilizing an eight-pointed star sigil as its central operational tool. It integrates Babylonian deity names, planetary correspondences, color theory, and a modified chakra system, conceptualized as 'Energy Transformer Personalities.' The magic is fundamentally based on channeling and directing psychic energy through conscious will, visualization, chanting, and physical actions, aimed at causing tangible changes in the practitioner's reality. The system is highly adaptable, encouraging experimentation and a pragmatic approach to achieve specific goals across all life aspects.
tools: Ishtar Star Sigil (eight-pointed diagram, drawn or printed, for altar use)
Ishtar Medallion (wearable, charged version of the Ishtar Star)
Ishtar Multi-Star Sheet (larger, multi-purpose sigil for amplified energy)
Aluminum Foil-Lined Cones (used with gemstones for targeted energy direction)
'Psychic Stick' (homemade electronic device for protection and banishing)
Symbolic Objects (dollar bills, John the Conqueror root, perfume oils, yarn, onion, dates, chili bone)
Writing Implements (for personalized chants and dream programming)
rituals: Ishtar Altar Star Ritual (saluting Energy Transformer Personalities)
Chakra Clearing Chants with specific deity names
Ishtar Pentagram Ritual (sequence of touching Ishtar Star points for focused energy)
Ishtar Money/Fertility Rite (using Ishtar Star, dollar bills, and chants for abundance)
Ishtar Renewal Rite (chakra breathing and chanting for healing and vitality)
Ishtar Friendship-Attracting/Mating Call Rite (using ingredients, chants for social/romantic success)
Ishtar Psychic Blockbuster (physical banishing ritual with charcoal, onion, dates, chili bone)
Ishtar/Marduk Laser Power (mental projection to 'burn away' obstacles)
Ishtar Future Viewing Rite (mental projection for precognition)
Ishtar Vector Rite (ritual to actively change future events)
Astral Projection Exercises (with Ishtar, Thoth, Bast energies and dream programming)

relevant_quotes.text: Magic, in the sense that we will use it, is accurately defined as causing change in accordance with your will.
The Ishtar Power is not concerned with your ethnic or religious background or the color of your skin, but the quality of your AURA.
The eight power points of the Star of Ishtar and how they are important to you.
To draw your Ishtar Altar Star and the Ishtar Medallion... is just the right size for a FREE drawing of the Altar Star that is just the right size for your altar work.
The materialist viewpoint, we could look upon this chapter as a form of insurance policy—this is the way to be certain that you can keep all the good you have and continue to increase it.

The Ishtar Power is indeed capable of burning your way out of any set of conditions. When you focus them together on a condition, they will act just like the Buck Rogers disintegrator ray and burn away the limiting condition.

critical_analysis.relevance: Al G. Manning's 'The Magic of New Ishtar Power' is a significant work within the 'New Age Occultism' movement of the late 20th century. It bridges traditional esoteric concepts (deities, planetary correspondences, chakras, sigils) with a pragmatic, results-oriented, and often psychological approach characteristic of practical magic and self-help literature. Manning's distinctive style, incorporating pop culture analogies (e.g., 'Buck Rogers disintegrator ray,' 'Star Trek'), sets it apart from more traditional grimoire traditions. Its emphasis on 'personal power' and universal applicability without strict religious dogma aligns it with modern magical currents like Chaos Magic, even predating some of its widespread popularization, by focusing on belief as a tool for efficacy. It contextualizes magic as a personal science of influence and self-mastery.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The book targets individuals seeking practical, tangible results in their daily lives across various domains (finances, health, love, psychic abilities) who may be drawn to occult or esoteric practices but prefer a simplified, accessible, and non-dogmatic system. It appeals to those interested in self-empowerment, personal development, and using psychic energy for practical ends, rather than purely spiritual enlightenment or complex ceremonial magic. Its accessible language and focus on 'how-to' make it suitable for beginners in practical magic, but its detailed system of correspondence and ritual offers depth for sustained practice.
